alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 8:01AM EDT until July 12 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Moderate flood stage where water reaches Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 03/31/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8 Observed Stage at Mon 7 am: 9.2 Forecast: Mon 8 am 9.3 Mon 2 pm 10.0 Mon 8 pm 9.4 Tue 2 am 9.2 Tue 8 am 9.0 Tue 2 pm 8.8 Tue 8 pm 8.6 Wed 2 am 8.5 Wed 8 am 8.3 Wed 2 pm 8.1 Wed 8 pm 7.9 Thu 2 am 7.6 &&
